extension.name: Exchange Server Unified Messaging Performance Monitor

metric.name: Call Answer Queued Messages
metric.description: Shows the number of messages created and not yet submitted for delivery.

metric.name: Direct Access Failures
metric.description: Shows the number of times that attempts to access Active Directory failed.

metric.name: Hub Transport Access Failures
metric.description: Shows the number of times that attempts to access a Hub Transport server failed. This number is only incremented if all Hub Transport servers were unavailable.

metric.name: Unhandled Exceptions/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of calls that were disconnected after an internal system error occurred in the last second.

metric.name: Queued OCS User Event Notifications
metric.description: Represents the number of missed call notifications that have been generated in the Office Communications Server environment and have not been submitted for delivery.

metric.name: Operations over Six Seconds
metric.description: Shows the number of all Unified Messaging operations that took more than six seconds to complete. This is the time during which a caller was waiting for Unified Messaging to respond.

metric.name: Mailbox Server Access Failures
metric.description: Shows the number of times the system did not access a Mailbox server.

metric.name: Calls Disconnected by Callers During UM Audio Hourglass
metric.description: Shows the number of calls during which the caller disconnected while Unified Messaging was playing the audio hourglass tones.

property.value: Calls Disconnected by Callers During UM Audio Hourglass

description.value: These counters provide an excellent summary of the health of the Unified Messaging server role in Microsoft Exchange Server as well as its interaction with other server roles.
